About Me

Who is David?

BIO

Aspiring Full-Stack Engineer

David is currently employed as a Systems Engineer and his goal is to transfer into a Full-Stack Engineering career. As a Systems Engineer, he works on multiple projects where he is heavily involved with integrating multiple systems across different industries. His knowledge of the System Development Life Cylce (SDLC) has allowed him to be effcient while executing the implementation phase of any of the Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA) projects that he has contributed to.
